testcase.classname: Calculate EMI for Home loan, Car loan and Personal loan
testcase.name: Calculate EMI for Personal and Car loan
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on the Emi calculator page............................passed When User clicks on the Personal Loan tab...................................passed And User enters Personal_Loan_Amount and Personal_Interest_Rate and Personal_Loan_Tenure.passed And clicks Enter............................................................passed Then Loan EMI is displayed..................................................passed And Total Interest Payable is displayed.....................................passed And Total Payment is displayed..............................................passed When User clicks on the Car Loan tab........................................passed And User enters Car_Loan_Amount and Car_Interest_Rate and Car_Loan_Tenure...passed And clicks Enter............................................................passed Then Car Loan EMI is displayed..............................................passed And Car Interest Payable is displayed.......................................passed And Car Payment is displayed................................................passed
